dict.acceptation: 观察；观察力；注意；观察报告；

sent.orig: Observation accuracy is one of the most important factors in dam observation.
sent.trans: 观测精度历来是大坝观测中最需要关注的要素之一。

sent.orig: Method: Sample collection, culture observation and microsectile observation.
sent.trans: 方法：定期采集和栽培观察，显微切片观察。

sent.orig: This paper mainly summarizes the development of earth observation science and based space station earth observation.
sent.trans: 综述了地球观测科学的发展以及空间站对地观测。

sent.orig: The conditions of observation to the astronomical site would affect directly the quality of astronomical observation.
sent.trans: 天文台台址的优良与否将会直接影响到天文观测的质量。

sent.orig: The result has the reference significance for choosing geoelectric observation location and observation data error correction.
sent.trans: 分析结果对地电观测台站选址、及其观测数据误差校正具有参考价值。
